name: sky-attack
flavor_text: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_text_simple: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
